content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add ensure_examples() method to UnifiedTypeInfo with small helper functions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding ensure_examples
Add transform_value() method to UnifiedTypeInfo with small helper functions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding transform_value
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues without using dead code attributes or underscore prefixes
Update create_correction_from_discovery in extras_integration.rs to use ensure_examples()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating extras_integration
Simplify build_corrected_value_from_type_info in recovery_engine.rs to use ensure_examples()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating build_corrected_value_from_type_info
Update attempt_pattern_based_correction to try transform_value() first
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating pattern correction
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues without using dead code attributes or underscore prefixes
Remove create_math_vector_correction function from recovery_engine.rs
Remove create_quaternion_correction function from recovery_engine.rs
Remove create_vector_examples function from recovery_engine.rs
Remove create_math_type_info function from recovery_engine.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing functions
Simplify fallback_pattern_based_correction to use new methods
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after simplifying fallback
Update enum_variant.rs to use UnifiedTypeInfo examples instead of inline generation
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating enum transformer
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any final clippy issues without using dead code attributes or underscore prefixes
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to review changes focusing on duplication, complexity, and implementation validation
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with the user
